isp-modem.name: OPNSENSE
notes: set to google for ping sake

list.content:
DOUBLE CLICK ON DESKTOP
OR LONG PRESS ON MOBILE
TO OPEN RACK VIEW

Router is live!
Uses http requests to live ping
